entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 08:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then southeast 20 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
